archimate:Requirement.name: PS-4(1): Personnel Termination | Post-employment Requirements
archimate:Requirement.documentation: (a) Notify terminated individuals of applicable, legally binding post-employment requirements for the protection of organizational information; and (b) Require terminated individuals to sign an acknowledgment of post-employment requirements as part of the organizational termination process.

properties.value: Organizations consult with the Office of the General Counsel regarding matters of post-employment requirements on terminated individuals.
